text: Niederglatt is a municipality in the district of Dielsdorf in the canton of Zurich in Switzerland. ==Gallery== File:Niederglatt Luftbild.jpg|Niederglatt File:Niederglatt 064.JPG|Niederglatt File:Niederglatt poshtoficejo 062.JPG|Postoffice File:Niederglatt lernejo 090.JPG|School File:Niederglatt stacidomo 056.JPG|Niederglatt train station File:Niederglatt restoracio Loewen 071.JPG|Restaurant LÃ¶wen File:Niederglatt preghejo 086.JPG|Church of Niederglatt ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website Category:Municipalities in Dielsdorf
